newsitem.title: USA: Semiconductor to expand plant capacity.
newsitem.headline: Semiconductor to expand plant capacity.

text.p: Semiconductor Laser International Corp Thursday said it plans immediately to double the size of the plant at its 15,000 square foot manufacturing facility and expand the 4,000 square foot clean room.
They estimated the expansion, called "Phase II" and expected to be completed later this year, would provide the company with the capacity to produce $45 million in revenue.
Semiconductor Laser manufactures high power semiconductor lasers.
